backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing client, task, assignee, and user‑profile storage with access‑controlled CRUD helpers and per‑caller maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature‑evidence report listing three tested frontend features tied to urlParams.ts and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files covering routing, pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes and global CSS variables.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document setting favicon, title, viewport, and mounting the React entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with authentication gating, URL cleanup hook, profile loading, and route definitions.
frontend/src/components/assignees/Assign: Dialog for uploading assignees via CSV with parsing, validation, error handling, and bulk‑create mutation.
Modal form to create, update, or delete an assignee with validation and API mutations.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Always-open modal prompting the user to enter and save their name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignedOutSc: Public landing screen showing branding and a sign-in button using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientBu: Dialog for CSV-based bulk client upload with template download, parsing, validation, and submission.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientFo: Form dialog for creating or editing a client with field validation and delete support.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppStartu: Error boundary that catches startup errors and displays a fallback screen.
frontend/src/components/errors/StartupEr: UI screen shown on startup failure with messaging and a reload button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with navigation, mobile sidebar, user menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/tasks/InlineComm: Inline editor for task comments with edit, cancel, and save actions using updateTaskComment.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskBulkEd: Dialog for applying bulk updates to multiple tasks with conditional field updates and status handling.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskBulkUp: Dialog to upload tasks via CSV, showing parsed results, validation errors, and submitting valid tasks for creation.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskDetail: Read‑only panel displaying all task details including status, dates, billing, and optional fields.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskFormDi: Form dialog for creating or editing a task with full field set, validation, and status handling.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskQuickS: Quick‑change dropdown for updating a task’s status directly via updateTask.
frontend/src/constants/taskStatus.ts: Defines allowed task statuses and helpers for validating, normalizing, coercing, and labeling statuses.
frontend/src/hooks/assignees.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD and bulk operations on assignees via the actor API, with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/clients.ts: Implements React Query hooks for fetching, creating, updating, deleting, and bulk operations on clients through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/tasks.ts: Defines React Query hooks for task retrieval and mutations, including detailed update logic and bulk operations with cache refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches and saves the caller’s user profile using the actor, with authentication-aware query enabling.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeferredUrlCleanup: Extracts secret URL parameters into session storage and clears them from the URL after mount.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including identity loading, login, logout, and status management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and a custom light/dark theme using CSS variables for UI colors and styling.
frontend/src/lib/dataParser.ts: Deprecated utilities for parsing and encoding legacy client data formats, kept for compatibility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AssigneesPage.tsx: UI page for listing, searching, selecting, editing, bulk uploading, and bulk deleting assignees.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDetailPage.tsx: Displays client details, related tasks, stats, and provides dialogs for editing clients and adding tasks.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsPage.tsx: Lists clients with search, selection, bulk upload, and bulk delete, plus navigation to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows task statistics, upcoming and overdue tasks, and links to filtered task views.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Full task management page with filters, sorting, bulk operations, exports, and task editing dialogs.
frontend/src/utils/assigneeCsv.ts: Generates and downloads CSV templates, parses CSV content, validates rows, and converts data for backend use.
frontend/src/utils/clientCsv.ts: Provides CSV template generation, downloading, and parsing for bulk client upload with validation of required fields.
frontend/src/utils/taskAggregations.ts: Aggregates task data by category, subcategory, status, and combinations to compute counts and revenue summaries.
frontend/src/utils/taskCsv.ts: Generates task CSV templates and parses task CSV files into structured objects with validation for required fields and types.
frontend/src/utils/taskDisplay.ts: Formats task dates, currency, and optional text fields with consistent placeholders for display.
frontend/src/utils/taskExcel.ts: Converts tasks to Excel-friendly rows, loads SheetJS, and exports data to a downloadable XLSX file.
frontend/src/utils/taskSort.ts: Sorts tasks by various fields using safe comparison logic for numbers, strings, and timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing and state management.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme settings (colors, fonts, animations), and typography/container/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state, architectural notes, known issues, and existing features for a task/client management app.
